answers: The ESS Technology Roadmap provides insights on global ESS development and economics.

answers: The TR 77 offers guidelines for deploying and maintaining storage systems in Singapore.

Questions: What problem does the ESS address?
answers: The ESS addresses solar intermittency and enhances grid resilience.

answers: The ACCESS program aims to promote ESS adoption in Singapore.

answers: The EOI aims to build and operate 200MW/200MWh of ESS in Singapore.
